select h.hospital_name, c.collect_name, c.collect_sex, c.collect_birth_data, c.collect_card, p.package_name, p.id AS packageId, c.sampling_point, c.status, c.tube_card, c.collect_nation from collect_info c left join package_info p on c.package_id=p.id left join hospital_info h on h.id=c.hospital_id where c.delete_flag=0
and c.id=#{id}

SELECT sum(CASE WHEN `status` = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cancellation, sum(CASE WHEN `status` = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS noCancellation, sum(*) allUser FROM collect_info WHERE delete_flag = 0
AND create_on = #{dto.createON}
